snippet: In our latest installment of this exclusive series of interviews by Doug Aitken, the artist interviews the architect Liz Diller, a founding member of Diller Scofidio + Renfro.
abstract: In our latest installment of this exclusive series of interviews by Doug Aitken, the artist interviews the architect Liz Diller, a founding member of Diller Scofidio + Renfro.

headline.main: The Source | Liz Diller in Conversation With Doug Aitken
